param.name: description
param.value: Used for sending a mail when the user has request a password reset

customChange.param:
Hello ${recipient_first_name} ${recipient_last_name},


You recently requested a new password for ${application_name}.


Please click on the link below to reset your password:


RESET PASSWORD


Please note if you did not request a new password, someone may have been trying to access your account without your permission. As long as you do not click the link contained in the email, no action will be taken and your account will remain secure. 


Sincerely,

${application_name}

param.name: description
param.value: Used for sending a mail to the user when the password has been updated

customChange.param:

Your password has been updated to:


${recipient_password}


Please make sure to change your password after login.

Sincerely,

${application_name}
